00020 /** \file
00021  \brief gps database logging stuff
00022  */
00023 
00024 #include "gpsdb.h"
00025 
00026 #include <stdio.h>
00027 
00028 #include "sqlite3.h"
00029 
00030 int creategpstable(sqlite3 *db) {
00031     char create_sql[] = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gps (lat REAL, lon REAL, alt REAL, speed REAL, course REAL, gpstime REAL, time REAL, trip INTEGER)";
00032 
00033     /// sqlite3 return status
00034     int rc;
00035     /// sqlite3 error message
00036     char *errmsg;
00037 
00038     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, create_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00039         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s: %s\n", create_sql, errmsg);
00040         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00041         return 1;
00042     }
00043 
00044 
00045     // Create the index
00046     char create_idx_sql[] = "CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS IDX_GPSTIME ON gps (time)";
00047 
00048     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, create_idx_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00049         fprintf(stderr, "Not Fatal: sqlite error creating index %s: %s\n", create_idx_sql, errmsg);
00050         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00051     }
00052 
00053     char create_idxtrip_sql[] = "CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS IDX_GPSTRIP ON gps (trip)";
00054 
00055     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, create_idxtrip_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00056         fprintf(stderr, "Not Fatal: sqlite error creating index %s: %s\n", create_idxtrip_sql, errmsg);
00057         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00058     }
00059 
00060 
00061     return 0;
00062 }
00063 
00064 int creategpsinsertstmt(sqlite3 *db, sqlite3_stmt **ret_stmt) {
00065     char insert_sql[] = "INSERT INTO gps (lat,lon,alt,speed,course,gpstime,time,trip) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)";
00066 
00067     int rc;
00068     const char *zTail;
00069 
00070     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db,insert_sql,-1,ret_stmt,&zTail);
00071     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00072         fprintf(stderr, "Can't prepare statement %s: %s\n", insert_sql, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00073         return 0;
00074     }
00075 
00076     return 4;
00077 
00078 }
